patterns: What kind of company is Upflairs?
responses: Upflairs Pvt Ltd is an edtech company based in Jaipur offering cutting-edge training in AI, ML, IoT, DevOps, Cloud Computing, and Embedded Systems since 2021.
We're a skill development company specializing in hands-on training and internships with real-world projects in future technologies.
As an education technology innovator, we focus on immersive learning through AI, VR, and industry-aligned curriculum.
We offer 2-6 month internships in Python, AI/ML, Full-Stack, Flutter, and Embedded Systems with stipends ranging from ‚Çπ5k-15k based on performance.
Our internship program includes: 1) Technical training 2) Live project work 3) Mentor guidance 4) Certification 5) Placement assistance
Internship applications are open year-round. Visit our careers page or email internships@upflairs.com with your resume and area of interest.
Our flagship programs: 1) AI Engineer (6 months) 2) Full-Stack Developer (4 months) 3) Cloud Architect (3 months) 4) IoT Specialist (5 months) 5) DevOps Engineer (3 months)
We offer 40+ courses across: ‚Ä¢ Artificial Intelligence ‚Ä¢ Web/Mobile Development ‚Ä¢ Cloud & DevOps ‚Ä¢ Robotics & IoT ‚Ä¢ Cybersecurity ‚Ä¢ Data Science
New batches starting monthly for: Python Programming, Generative AI, React Native, AWS/Azure, Embedded Linux, and more.
